p: To identify the enzymatic activity of binase, the growth medium from subconfluence (90–95%) A549 cells in a 96-well plate (in triplicate) was replaced with 100 μg/ml binase (final concentration) containing complete DMEM and incubated for 48 h at 37°C in 5% CO 2. The supernatant (cell culture fluid) containing binase was collected to measure the binase activity using RNase activity assay as described before (see Section 2.3).
